mapper.insert: insert into menu (id, text, url, parentid) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{text,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select m.id, m.text, m.url, p.id p_id,p.text p_text,p.url p_url from menu m left join menu p on m.parentid = p.id
select id, text, url, parentid from menu where parentid is null
